overview: Sugih Jamin is co-founder and Chairman of Zattoo. Sugih is also Associate Professor of computer science at the University of Michigan. He has played around plenty in the area of Internet measurement, protocol, infrastructure design and deployment. Sugih was visiting Professor at the University of Tokyo as well as at the University of Cambridge, and has worked at Xerox PARC. He has collected numerous awards including the Sloan Foundation Fellowship, the NSF CAREER Award, and the White House Presidential Award.
